Recipe.title: Dutch Oven BBQ Ribs to Di For
Recipe.Description:
Before they were married Di and Ransom had a BBQ Rips bake-off with missionaries as the judges. Ransom did the Slow Cooker BBQ Spare Ribs recipe. Di won, but then (a long time later) Di told Ransom that her sauce recipe was something like: "Buy a bottle of Tony Roma BBQ Sauce".
Ransom tried her cooking method and found it did give the ribs a great consistency, so, after several attempts, we came up with BBQ Ribs to Di For.
Then we modified it slightly to go in a Dutch Oven and it turned out great!

section.instruction: Place Dutch Oven on coles to heat.
While it is heating, cut Onion into rings about ¼&inch; thick.
Place Onions, Water and Spare Ribs into Dutch Oven and turn until browned.
Add all other ingredients and mix well.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionallly, until meat is thoroughly cooked.
